## Project description

Review of integrity practices of water and sanitation utilities, using
an assessment tool and data by the Water Integrity Network. The key
questions the assessment is aiming to answer are:

-   is there significant variation in the practices of utilities across
    the world?

<!-- -->

-   are there regional trends?

-   are there major trends, strengths, and weaknesses?

-   do scores differ based on management model of the utility?

-   do scores differ according to the regulatory model and requirements
    for reporting?
